subdisciplines.name: Transport Economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the transportation system and its economic implications, including infrastructure development, public policy, and pricing strategies.

subdisciplines.name: Housing Economics
subdisciplines.description: The analysis of the housing market, including supply and demand, pricing and affordability, and the impact of public policy on housing outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Urban Planning
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical design and management of cities, including land use regulation, transportation planning, and environmental sustainability.
